structure.unit: B FERTILIZER AND PESTICIDE USE AND APPLICATION

law.text: The department may provide for inspection of any equipment used for application of pesticides and may require repairs or other changes before its further use for pesticide application. A list of requirements that equipment shall meet may be adopted by regulation.
law.history: Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 148, sec. 15. -- Created 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 130, sec. 16.
